addSupportedSuperToken(address).details: Check if this function needs to be modified for native super tokens

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

lowerLimit().notice: Number of seconds, hours or days worth of liquidity below which top up is done

strollRegistry().notice: Registry contract containing top up data

supplyAssetLimit().notice: Number of LP tokens or equivalent assets that a user can provide for making top ups

supportedSuperToken(address).notice: Map of underlying tokens and their super tokens

upperLimit().notice: Number of seconds, hours or days worth of liquidity to be topped up with
